Premium CA Adhesives

For nearly 30 years, Starbond has stuck to its roots in supplying unrivaled adhesive quality and customer-centric solutions. The technology in our unique semi-flexible formula has been perfected in Japan for over 45 years. Through countless use and testing of our very own products, we learned about the most important user application needs. We take pride in supplying premium superglues that have a stronger hold, consistent results, and longer lasting shelf lives.
